About Me!

I am a 4th year student at UC Santa Barbara and I am an aspiring software enginner, entrepreneur, and accountant. Some of my interests are Web Development, Machine Learning, Algorithms, Accounting, Global Studies, and Risk Management. I am passionate about programming and having an array of ventures.

When I am away from my computer, I like to play basketball and attend concerts

Check out my Wonderful World!
